title: New South Wales: One-Hour Mother's Day PhotoshootÂ for up to Eight People
description:
Give the gift of lifelong memories for Mother's Day and say 'I love you,' with a one-hour professional photoshoot experience with Travelshoot, Australia's leading travel photography experts. You'll have the luxury of deciding between three iconic New South Wales landscapes for you and your family to be photographed in - vibrant Byron Bay, the mist-covered peaks of the Blue Mountains or by Sydney's countless landmarks. Be guided by your expert photographer on the day, as they capture a series of candid, natural and relaxed moments - including warm smiles and tender hugs shared between you and your loved ones.

This experience's great strength is its flexibility - bring up to eight guests, including infants and children of all ages, and decide on a time and place that suits you. You'll receive 30 edited digital images within seven days of your photoshoot; your captured memories to print, frame and hang.
location_heading: Sydney, Byron Bay or Blue Mountains
